title: nf-core/mdsimulations pipeline - params.input schema
description: Schema for the file provided with params.input

sample.description: Name of the molecule to simulate
sample.errorMessage: Sample name must be provided and cannot contain spaces

structure.description: Path to the structure file (PDB format)
structure.errorMessage: FastQ file for reads 1 must be provided, cannot contain spaces and must have extension '.fq.gz' or '.fastq.gz'

em_mdp.description: Path to the energy minimization MDP file
em_mdp.errorMessage: Energy minimization MDP file must be provided and must exist

nvt_mdp.description: Path to the NVT equilibration MDP file
nvt_mdp.errorMessage: NVT equilibration MDP file must be provided and must exist

npt_mdp.description: Path to the NPT equilibration MDP file
npt_mdp.errorMessage: NPT equilibration MDP file must be provided and must exist

md_mdp.description: Path to the production MD MDP file
md_mdp.errorMessage: Production MD MDP file must be provided and must exist

force_field.errorMessage: Force field must be one of the following: charmm27, charmm36, amber, amber99sb, amber14sb

distance_to_box.description: Distance from the solute to the edge of the box in nm
distance_to_box.errorMessage: Distance to box must be a number between 0.0 and 5.0 nm
